content: Stream created by Mario Carneiro.
Indeed! Has anyone been using Lean for this purpose?
It was back in the Lean 2 days, but, https://github.com/Kha/electrolysis

i've just finished writing a bit about design by contract with Lean https://techualization.blogspot.com/2020/05/design-by-contract-with-lean-theorem.html. not the right way to do things in Lean, so i'm expecting many critiques.
You could use the community web editor instead of the official one, but maybe it makes no difference to you
I think that in either one you can make URLs which have the code already pasted in
Probably this would be better discussed in a dedicated thread, and not in "stream events".
